name: CVE-2019-5419
description: There is a possible denial of service vulnerability in Action View (Rails) <5.2.2.1, <5.1.6.2, <5.0.7.2, <4.2.11.1 where specially crafted accept headers can cause action view to consume 100% cpu and make the server unresponsive.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:rubyonrails:rails:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:rubyonrails:rails:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:rubyonrails:rails:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:rubyonrails:rails:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:8.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:software_collections:1.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:cloudforms:4.6:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:redhat:cloudforms:4.7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:opensuse:leap:15.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:opensuse:leap:15.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:30:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
